testcase.classname: Full Signup, Login, and Cleanup Flow
testcase.name: Verify Scroll Up without 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed And User navigates to "http://automationexercise.com".......................passed Then Home page should be visible successfully...............................passed When user scrolls down to the bottom of the page............................passed Then user should see the "SUBSCRIPTION" section in ScrollNavigation.........passed When user scrolls back to the top of the page manually......................passed Then user should see the text "Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers".passed
